resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
We are here for Your Safety and Security Suggest us Your new Idea for Improvements..
Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history
Application update is required for app to work properly, please update application.
Without this permission the app is unable to detect verification code received in your SMS. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
SMS permission is not allowed. So auto detection of OTP is disabled.
Without the camera and storage permissions the app is unable to open camera, take a picture and store to the device. Are you sure you want to deny these permissions?
To capture a picture and store to the device the application requires access to the camera and storage. Can you allow camera and storage permissions?
Without the camera and storage permissions the app is unable to open camera and take a video. Are you sure you want to deny these permissions?
To take a video the application requires access to the camera and storage. Can you allow camera and storage permissions?
Without the location permission the app is unable to open map and pick location. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
To pick location the application requires location permission. Can you allow the permission?
Without the storage permission the app is unable to run perfectly. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
The application requires storage permission to run perfectly. Can you allow storage permission?
Without the storage permission the app is unable to pick image from gallery. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
To pick image from gallery the application requires storage permission. Can you allow storage permission?
Without the contacts permission the app is unable to get contacts information. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
The application requires contacts permission to get contacts information. Can you allow contacts permission?
Without the microphone permission the app is unable to record audio. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
The application requires microphone permission to record audio. Can you allow microphone permission?
Without the storage and contacts permissions the app is unable to run perfectly. Are you sure you want to deny these permissions?
The application requires storage and contacts permissions to run perfectly. Can you allow storage and contacts permissions?
Without this permission the app is unable to open camera and scan QR code. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
To scan the QR code the application required access to the camera. Can you allow camera permission?
To add event in calender the application require calender permission.Can you allow the permission?
Without this permission the app is unable to open calender. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
The application require Phone permission.Can you allow the permission?
Without this permission the app is unable to open Phone Call. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
Without the storage permission the app is unable to pick image from gallery. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
Without the storage permission the app is unable to pick audio from gallery. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
To pick image from gallery the application requires storage permission. Can you allow storage permission?
To pick audio from gallery the application requires storage permission. Can you allow storage permission?
The application requires system alert window permission for display caller info. Can you allow system alert window permission?
Without the read call log permission the app is unable to display caller info. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
The application requires read call log permission for display caller info. Can you allow read call log permission?
Without the change wifi state permission the app is unable to display caller info. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
The application require SMS permission.Can you allow the permission?
Without this permission the app is unable to read message. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
Without the phone state permission the app is unable to record audio. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
The application requires phone state permission to record call. Can you allow microphone permission?
